name: wxStocks
description: wxStocks: Investment Analysis for Python Programmers. Write your own screens, ranking functions, and even high level analysis algorithms to help you review or create your own portfolio. Scrape basic data from Nasdaq, Yahoo Finance, Morningstar and more or import your own data by writing your own custom importers for .xls and .csv importers. wxStocks is currently functional, but will be going through a complete rewrite to integrate pandas very soon.
